dcterms:creator: Shiyu Liu
Yao Jia
Mehul Motani
dcterms:description: The dataset contains information from 177 medical patients, including demographic and medical information recorded by a wearable system that continuously monitors vital signs. Key features include age, gender, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood oxygen saturation, body temperature, and systolic blood pressure, recorded at regular intervals over 24 hours.
dcterms:title: Medical Patient Dataset
